name: CPBarButtonProviding
desc: The methods that templates use to provide buttons for the navigation bar.

items.name: var backButton: CPBarButton?
items.desc: A button to display as the Back button on the navigation bar.

items.name: var leadingNavigationBarButtons: [CPBarButton]
items.desc: An array of bar buttons to display on the leading side of the navigation bar.

items.name: var trailingNavigationBarButtons: [CPBarButton]
items.desc: An array of bar buttons to display on the trailing side of the navigation bar.

items.name: class CPBarButton
items.desc: A button for placement in a navigation bar.

items.name: class CPMessageComposeBarButton
items.desc: A button that activates Siri and initiates the compose message flow.
